full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BUM GTER DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
